blueprints.description:
A blueprint is a file that contains Voxel models (3D Models information) for Trove's collectibles.
This includes the Items, Blocks, Item Icons, Mounts, Allies, Costumes and much more.

software.name: Qubicle
software.description: Qubicle is a professional voxel editor that is used to create voxel models.

software.name: MagicaVoxel
software.description: MagicaVoxel is a free lightweight 8-bit voxel editor and interactive path tracing renderer.

software.name: Zoxel
software.description: Zoxel is a free voxel editor that is used to create and edit voxel models.

software.name: VoxelShop
software.description: VoxelShop is a free voxel editor that is used to create and edit voxel models.

software.name: Troxel
software.description: Troxel is a free online voxel editor that is used to create and edit voxel models.

software.name: Metaforge
software.description: Metaforge is a free in-game voxel editor that is used to create and edit voxel models.

vfx.description:
Create visual effects for Trove's collectibles.
This includes the Items, Blocks, Item Icons, Mounts, Allies, Costumes and much more.

software.name: PopcornFX (1.13.5)
software.description: PopcornFX is a free particle editor that is used to create visual effects.

ui.description: UI (User Interface) is used to edit user interfaces present in Trove and alter or add to their functionality.

software.name: Adobe Animate
software.description: Adobe Animate is a professional animation software that is used to create visual effects.

software.name: Jpexs Free Flash Decompiler
software.description: Jpexs Free Flash Decompiler is a free tool that is used to decompile and edit SWF files.

sound.description:
Create sound effects and music for Trove'.
This includes the Items, Blocks, Item Icons, Mounts, Allies, Costumes and much more.

software.name: BNK Replacer
software.description: BNK Replacer is a free tool that is used to replace sound effects in Trove's sound bank.

textures.description: Create textures for Trove's visual effects.

software.name: Paint.NET
software.description: Paint.NET is a free image and photo editing software that is used to create and edit textures.

software.name: GIMP
software.description: GIMP is a free image and photo editing software that is used to create and edit textures.
